mapper.select:
select tes.id id, tes.equipment_type equipmentType ,tes.equipment_sub_type equipmentSubType,tes.equipment_version equipmentVersion,
tes.soft_version softVersion,tes.brand brand,tes.operateos operateos,
tes.browser browser, tes.install_location installLocation,
tes.pre_ip preIp,tes.pre_port prePort,tes.monitor_port monitorPort,
tes.monitor_file monitorFile,tes.version_server_port versionServerPort,
tes.version_server_file_port versionServerFilePort,tes.local_monitor_port localMonitorPort,
tes.local_file_monitor_port localFileMonitorPort,tes.limit_per_day limitPerDay,
tes.currency_code currencyCode,tes.master_key masterKey,tes.amount amount,
tes.private_key privateKey,tes.online_time onlineTime,tes.use_state
useState , tes.create_admin_id createAdminId,tes.create_admin_name createAdminName, te.verify_status verifyStatus ,te.country_id countryId , te.second_region_id secondRegionId ,te.third_region_id thirdRegionId, te.fourth_region_id fourthRegionId ,te.detail_address detailAddress, tes1.trans_status transStatus , tes1.running_status runningStatus, tes1.module_status moduleStatus , tes1.banknote_box_status banknoteBoxStatus, tes1.network_status networkStatus ,tes1.prr_status prrStatus,tes1.maintain_status maintainStatus,tes1.connect_status connectStatus from tb_equipment te, tb_equipment_settings tes,tb_equipment_status tes1 where tes.id = #{_parameter} and
tes.id = te.id and tes1.id = te.id
select settings_value softVersion from tb_settings where settings_type = '3' and status = '0'
select brand from tb_equipment_settings GROUP BY brand
select equipment_version equipmentVersion from tb_equipment_settings GROUP BY equipment_version
